text: The Shakyawal Koli, or Shakyaval Koli is a subcaste of the Koli caste found in the Indian states of Uttar Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh and Rajasthan. Shakyawal Kolis does not support to commit feticide and Also evils like dowry system, child marriage. == Organisations == * Shri Shakyawal Koli Samaj Vikas Samiti, Susawan * Shakyawal Koli Samaj Mahapanchayat, Rajasthan == References == Category:Koli subcastes
title: Shakyawal Koli
